summary: An Ordinance relating to the Building Code of the City of Seattle, regulating the construction, alteration, repair, use and occupation of buildings and structures, amending Sections 132 (as amended), 210, 935, 936, 1025, 1026, 1027, 1029 and 1030 of Ordinance No. 31578, adding new sections numbered 930a, 931, 932, 933 and 934 thereto, and repealing Sections 938 (as amended), 939, 1031, 1032, (as amended), 1033, 1034, 1035 and 1040 thereof.
